overview: Gordon must be the luckiest photographer in Los Angeles! He’s always surrounded by the prettiest, sexiest models in the business! Normally, Gordon shoots for, sportswear companies, but when he gets a commission to do a swimwear session, he’s suddenly surrounded by a bevy of big-boobed beauties, who are not only prepared to show all, they’re ready and willing to do everything too!  Porno super-stars Trinity Loren, Tammy and Brigette, are a “tit-man’s” dream - the biggest trio of “bra busters” in the business. Gordon, his client and one of his male models enjoy some of the hottest sex they’ve ever experienced, and  the girls make the action even spicier with some succulent lesbian loving. What’s in the swimsuits is mostly out in the studio where breatstroke is the best stroke!
title: Breast Stroke
